programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins' sister stirs up trouble and a possible SVU investigation when she reports a doctor who trades prescription painkillers for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman learning about her birth parents asks Benson for help; Carisi and Rollins weigh the risks of taking their relationship public.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Chief McGrath's daughter discloses a sexual assault, Benson must balance the intricacies of the investigation with McGrath's impulsive actions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect that Gabriel Thurman, an activist trying to stop the spread of AIDS, murdered a homosexual couple who had a new form of HIV.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Fin deals with colleagues who accuse his son of murder, he learns a secret that reveals more about his family's relationship with Darius.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A case becomes much more complicated when racy photos of a 15-year-old rape victim are leaked on the Internet; Stabler's son is drawn into a series of compromising events by his best friend.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Tutuola's future son-in-law becomes the latest victim in a series of hate crimes against gay men; the squad searches for a connection when a school teacher (Tony Hale) is attacked in a similar fashion.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A columnist who has been given access to the squad for a story declares a hate crime case a hoax, leaving the victim under media scrutiny and Benson fighting to get the case back on solid ground.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Taking an active approach to catching sex offenders, the team targets a photographer with a secret life whose fantasies may have crossed into reality.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro must face the consequence of his reckless behavior; when an online ad for escorts leads to the rape and robbery of tourists, Benson discovers she has a connection to one of the suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson struggles to balance work and her new role of foster mother; when Amaro arrests a young prostitute with connections to Noah's mother, his undercover work sets off a dangerous chain of events.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of allegations are made against a superstar basketball player, Sgt. Benson and Detective Carisi (Peter Scanavino) do not agree on the authenticity of each woman's story; the investigation takes Rollins back to her former precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro's by-the-book handling of a starlet's arrest gets him back on the SVU squad in time to investigate the actress's latest offense, statutory rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team tries to find a bike messenger -- who has kept a video diary of his troubles with women -- before he can commit another violent act; the new deputy chief calls Benson's leadership into question.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Sgt. Voight and Detectives Lindsay and Halstead work with Sgt. Benson and the SVU as they investigate the roots of a child pornography site; tension between Benson and Voight threaten the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Tutuola finds security footage of a sportscaster being physically abusive to his girlfriend, Benson seeks help from Assistant DA Barba to convince the victim to fight back.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Carisi's sister's fiancé falls back into bad habits and accuses his parole officer of rape, Carisi must investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: During an interview on a popular TV show, a college student claims she was gang raped in a fraternity, bringing national attention to rape on campus; Benson and Barba investigate multiple suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi opens a police investigation when his niece reports a classmate for sexual assault; Stone learns there are no perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for an abducted woman and her young daughter leads Lt. Benson to cross paths with an old friend; Stone must make a tough decision on behalf of his sister.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An Alzheimer's patient claims she was raped, but her illness casts doubt on the case; Fin's sergeant orders come in.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex, and Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex; Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Asta work together to try and get something Harry desperately needs.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the assault, murder and mutilation of a member of a women's empowerment group; Fin and Carisi wonder who the father of Rollins' baby is.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A columnist who has been given access to the squad for a story declares a hate crime case a hoax, leaving the victim under media scrutiny and Benson fighting to get the case back on solid ground.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When the mysterious death of a 23-year-old mother in New Mexico goes unsolved, her family searches for answers.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A pair of double homicides in Nebraska, five years apart, lead police to fear a serial killer may be on the loose.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A pair of double homicides in Nebraska, five years apart, leads police to fear a serial killer may be on the loose.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team gets a new lead in the mole investigation after an unknown assailant kills two men disguised as sheriff's deputies in front of Callen's home; Nell interviews a prison inmate who has information on the department's leak.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS looks into the disappearance of a Navy lieutenant commander who is working on foreign cyber threats with the NSA; the team celebrates the holidays.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a Navy reservist is killed protecting a city councilman, Sam goes under cover in a private security firm that has links to criminal organizations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a female video game developer who has been receiving death threats refuses to delay the launch of her new game, the cops must work to protect her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While working under cover to bust a sex trafficking ring, Carisi meets a woman who embedded herself in the organization in hope of finding and saving her daughter; Sgt. Benson is faced with a life-changing revelation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba's efforts to make an arrest in a case involving pornographic photos is stalled when several suspects come down with the measles; Amaro receives distressing news about his son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Efforts to find an 8-year-old boy kidnapped for ransom are hindered by tension between the child's estranged parents; Sgt. Benson is asked to take the lieutenant's exam and officially become the leader of the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Johnny D (Charles Halford) is on trial for sex trafficking, rape, assault and kidnapping, Noah's adoption becomes involved with the case, causing Benson to fear for the child's future; a threat could permanently change the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old who was part of a group of kids who put a transgender teen in the hospital is tried as an adult, the SVU team wonders whether the punishment fits the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unarmed black man is shot during the pursuit of a suspect, raising racial tensions; Barba must indict the three officers involved -- who claim they followed procedure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates when a father and his two young children are stabbed to death in their home; when the motives of the culprit are uncovered, Benson finds herself having mixed feelings about the nature of the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a waitress at a popular restaurant is sexually assaulted, SVU looks for the culprit at the top of the culinary food chain, but Benson and Stone hit a wall when it's time to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stone asks Benson to investigate a sexual encounter from his past that he feels guilt and uncertainty about; Rollins considers a proposal from Doctor Al.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of an elusive, shy teenage author living a double life leads Benson and the rest of the SVU on an investigation that uncovers a situation beyond their wildest imaginations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a he-said, she-said case when a woman crashes a wedding to accuse her therapist of sexual assault.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Filmmaker Brett Morgen chronicles events: Arnold Palmer plays his last round at a U.S. Open, the FIFA World Cup kicks off in Chicago, the Rangers celebrate on Broadway, O.J. Simpson leads America on a slow speed chase in a white Ford Bronco.

programme.title: The Grizzlie Truth
programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, it's an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy.

programme.title: Live: IndyCar Racing
programme.desc: The IndyCar Series moves to World Wide Technology Raceway for the Bommarito Automotive Group 500. Álex Palou failed to win for just the second time this year when he crashed out at the Detroit Grand Prix. Kyle Kirkwood claimed his second win of 2025.
